game.name: EG Plane Evo
game.description:
This time we have come up with a unique style of plane game where you have given a rectangle shaped track to fly your plane. You must try this out brand new aeroplane game especially if you had a dream of becoming an air giant or wanted to be a caption. It would be very exciting and crazy when you will get a chance to manage your very own airline or parking apron. Your primary objective is to purchase, merge and control your planes and set the biggest airline empire in the city. 

Merge planes and leave them to fly on the tracks so that you can earn some money! Use those money to buy upgraded planes to perform some cool tricks and stunts to grab extra coins and money in this one of the best html5 plane games for kids! It is up to you how quickly your merge planes and introduce them to track to fly and bring more money for you. Each successful round will help add some coins to your account. 

Enjoy some highly addictive spaceship games for free on atmegame.com and play them on multiple devices such as mobile phones, desktop and laptop computers, as well as iPhones and iPads. Make sure that you keep visiting our website regularly to spot the latest collection of new adventure games. We are highly dedicated to keep you closer to the best world of fun and entertainment during your boring hours. Good luck for a happy gaming experience!!
